column6: TA5.7;Circularity/Recycling;+2;The reduction of GHG emissions can be reinforced by the adoption of circular economy practices
column8: which can lead to a decrease in the production of new materials and the associated emissions. This connection is particularly relevant for targets like TA1.3
column9: which aims to reduce GHG emissions from buildings
column11: which focuses on reducing methane emissions.

column6: TA5.7;Critical Raw Materials - Extraction & Import;-1;The extraction and import of critical raw materials can be constrained by the reduction of GHG emissions
column7: as some of these materials may be associated with high emissions during their production and transportation. This could limit the options for achieving some of the GHG reduction targets
column9: which aims to reduce emissions from industrial processes.

column6: TA4.17;Waste Reduction - Plastic & Packaging;+1;The reduction of GHG emissions from transportation can be enabled by the reduction of plastic and packaging waste
column7: as this can lead to a decrease in the production of new plastics and the associated emissions. This connection is particularly relevant for targets like TA1.10
column8: which aims to reduce emissions from the transportation sector
column10: which focuses on reducing GHG intensity in the maritime sector.

column1: GHG Removal;TA7.8;Net-Zero Technology - Manufacturing;+2;The development of net-zero technologies can reinforce the removal of GHG emissions from the atmosphere
column2: as these technologies can be used to capture and utilize CO2. This connection is particularly relevant for targets like TA7.8
column3: which aims to remove GHG emissions through technological means.

column1: GHG Reduction - Buildings;TA1.15;Circularity/Recycling - Municipal Waste;+1;The reduction of GHG emissions from buildings can be enabled by the adoption of circular economy practices in the construction sector
column2: such as recycling and reuse of materials. This connection is particularly relevant for targets like TA1.15
column3: which aims to reduce emissions from buildings.

column6: TA4.17;Circularity/Recycling - Critical Raw Materials - Batteries Recycling;+2;The reduction of GHG emissions from transportation can be reinforced by the recycling and reuse of critical raw materials
column7: such as those used in batteries for electric vehicles. This connection is particularly relevant for targets like TA1.10
column8: which aims to reduce emissions from the transportation sector
column10: which focuses on reducing GHG intensity in the maritime sector.
